PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(94) ... noncommittal 不明朗的 noncommunicable 不会传染的 noncommunicant 不做礼拜的人.
as I said , this high-level meeting on noncommunicable diseases must be a watershed event .正如我所言，本次非传染性疾病问题高级别会议必须成为一个分水岭。
by 2030 , noncommunicable conditions are expected to cause more than 3 / 4 of all deaths .到2030年非传染性特征的疾病可能会引起超过3/4的死亡。
noncommercial 非贸易的, noncommunicable 不传染的, noncommitment 不构成

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(94) ... noncommunicable 不会传染的 noncommunicant 不做礼拜的人 noncommunist 非共产主义者.
as I said , this high-level meeting on noncommunicable diseases must be a watershed event .正如我所言，本次非传染性疾病问题高级别会议必须成为一个分水岭。
however , as women age , noncommunicable diseases become major causes of death and disability , particularly after the age of 45 years .但是，随着妇女年纪增长，非传染病成为主要的死亡和残疾原因，特别是在45岁以后。

means.word_mean: 1. (of disease) not capable of being passed on

auth_sentence.content: The Global Health Initiative at the World Economic Forum recently changed its focus from infectious to noncommunicable diseases.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Global Health Initiative at the World Economic Forum recently changed its focus from infectious to noncommunicable diseases.

auth_sentence.content: Cohen said noncommunicable diseases are not only a health issue, but an economic one as well.
